text:
Essentialism is not a way to do one more thing.  

It is a different way of doing everything.  

It is a way of thinking.  

Internalizing this way of thinking is not neutral.  

Certain ideas pull us toward Nonessentialism.  

People also peddle those ideas.  

There are three chapters in this part of the book.  

Each chapter addresses a fallacy of Nonessentialism.  

Each chapter replaces it with a truth of Essentialism.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Essentialism is a mindset that prioritizes doing fewer things better, contrasting with the distractions of Nonessentialism.
